subscription.cancel_support_subject: I need help with my GymPro subscription
subscription.cancel_support_body:
Hi GymPro Support Team,

I'm considering cancelling my subscription, but I wanted to reach out first to see if you can help me with...

[Please describe your concern here]

Thank you!
subscription.cancel_contact_message: We're sorry to see you considering cancellation. Before you go, would you like to tell us what's wrong? We're here to help!
subscription.cancel_contact_encourage: Our support team is ready to assist you and may have solutions you haven't considered yet.
subscription.cancel_warning_message: You'll keep access to all features until {{date}}, then your subscription will end.
subscription.cancel_reason_label: Please tell us why you're cancelling (required)
subscription.cancel_reason_placeholder: Help us improve by sharing your reason for leaving...
subscription.cancel_reason_too_short: Please provide a more detailed reason (minimum 10 characters)
